helps.text:
Converted to standard Envy 1.x by Jason Huang (god@sure.net)
Further conversion to Rom 2.4 by Jaceks and Chicken's Den Staff

mobiles.name: pitbeast pit-beast
mobiles.long_description: The big, ugly pit-beast is standing here sizing you up.
mobiles.description:
Ick... what a disgusting creature!  It is black and green and slimy
and it is drooling everywhere... looks mean too.

mobiles.name: newbie monster
mobiles.long_description: The newbie monster stands here looking confused.  Kill him!  Kill him!
mobiles.description:
What an odd looking little beast.  He looks harmless, but you never can
tell.  He is only about 4 feet tall, but he pretty muscular looking...
maybe you should ask if he needs help?  Nah... kill him.

mobiles.name: dragon baby
mobiles.long_description: Someone's little pet dragon has gotten loose, and is sniffing about here.
mobiles.description:
Awwww... how cute!  A little baby dragon.  He's about 3 feet long and you
just want to cuddle him to death... no, you really want to kill him to tell
the truth.  But, remember, even a little dragon can be a big problem.

mobiles.name: keeper guard monster
mobiles.long_description: The Newbie Guard is here wondering where that dragon went.
mobiles.description:
The Guard also had the job of taking care of the Alchemist's pet dragon,
but he doesn't seem to be doing a good job of it.  He looks at you and
says, 'Have you seen that dragon?  Master will have my head if I don't find
him.'

mobiles.name: alchemist newbie
mobiles.long_description: The Newbie Alchemist is here trying to make something.
mobiles.description:
He is a funny looking, furry little dude.  He looks really busy trying to
mix up a batch of something or other.

mobiles.name: crawler creepy bug thing
mobiles.long_description: A creepy little crawling thing is scuttling along the floor at your feet.
mobiles.description:
Yuck!  If they'd ever clean this place maybe it wouldn't attract vermin
like this disgusting, little, six-legged, brown bug.

mobiles.name: newbie zombie
mobiles.long_description: A VERY gaunt looking newbie... it looks like a zombie!
mobiles.description:
This guy has been lost in here too long... it is more zombie than man
now.  You would feel sorry for it, but it is moving in to attack!

mobiles.name: quasit imp thing
mobiles.long_description: A funny little imp-like thing (a quasit perhaps?) is sneaking about here.
mobiles.description:
Little green, vaguely humoniod shaped creature, with a long pointed tail.
It is hard to say because before you ever get a good look at it, it darts
back into the shadows.

mobiles.name: minotaur
mobiles.long_description: The Great Minotaur is wondering just what you'll taste like.
mobiles.description:
A massive man, with the head of a bull.  He looks as strong as bull too,
but not nearly as smart.  Actually, now that you consider it... he looks
a heck of a lot meaner than any bull you have ever seen... and he is
coming this way!

mobiles.name: spectre ghost
mobiles.long_description: The dark spectre is lurking in the shadows.
mobiles.description:
The soul of a long since passed on adventurer... it lurks here waiting for
a chance to bring death to any who cross its path.

mobiles.name: newbie annoying jerk
mobiles.long_description: A newbie is here annoying the hell out of you.
mobiles.description:
What a jerk!  He won't shut up, and he keeps making the most irritating
comments about everything.  Better silence him with cold, tempered steel
MUHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!

mobiles.name: newbie clueless moron
mobiles.long_description: A newbie is here looking terribly confused.
mobiles.description:
What a moron!  Every question that is answered in the help files, he will
ask and he will probably ask 2 or 3 times too.  This guy just doesn't get
it, best put him out of his misery.

mobiles.name: newbie talkative
mobiles.long_description: A newbie is here talking a lot.
mobiles.description:
Well, at least this gal seems pretty cool.  Talks a lot, but she's a
friendly, interesting sort.  Seems to have a clue what she's doing also,
unlike some others you might see.

mobiles.name: newbie lost
mobiles.long_description: A newbie is here wandering about aimlessly.
mobiles.description:
Hmmm... looks like he has been around a while, but he wandered a little
too far from home this time.  Don't think he knows quite where he is,
maybe you should help him out?

mobiles.name: newbie smart
mobiles.long_description: A newbie is here, and he looks quite sure of himself.
mobiles.description:
Here is a guy who has it all together.  Nice equipment too, must have read
the help files, Eh?

objects.name: sword newbie
objects.description: A shiny newbie sword is lying here waiting to be possessed.

objects.name: vest newbie
objects.description: A bright green newbie vest is lying here looking for a body to hug.

objects.name: helm helmet newbie
objects.description: A bright newbie helm is hoping a loose head will wander by.

objects.name: cloak dark newbie
objects.description: A dark newbie cloak is lying here hoping to smother you.

objects.name: ring signet newbie
objects.description: A newbie signet ring is lying in the dust here.

objects.name: dagger newbie
objects.description: A shiny newbie dagger is lying here looking for a back to stab.

objects.name: collar dragon
objects.description: Someone's pet dragon has escaped and left his collar here.

objects.name: key newbie
objects.description: A key with the newbie crest on it is here.

objects.name: light jar
objects.description: A jar of glowing fluid wants to brighten your day.

objects.name: horns horn
objects.description: The horns of the great Minotaur lie here.

objects.name: hide skin
objects.short_description: the smelly hide of the minotaur
objects.description: The hide of the great Minotaur is lying here.

objects.name: leggings newbie
objects.description: A pair of neat looking leggings are here.

objects.name: sleeves newbie
objects.description: A set of nifty sleeves is here.

objects.name: mace newbie
objects.description: A finely crafted newbie mace is waiting for a worthy owner.

objects.name: orb
objects.description: A baby dragon orb lies here.

rooms.name: The Entrance To The Newbie Zone
rooms.description:
Ahhh... the entrance to the newbie zone!  Just the place you have
been looking for.  Well, when you've readied yourself you can enter
to the north.
     There is a small (Glowing) (Huming) tablet.

exits.description: You see the start of the newbie zone.
Back to the school that way... chickening out already?

rooms.name: The Beginning Of The Passage
rooms.description:
You find yourself entering a long corridor.  You can hear the sound
of creatures roaming about, but you can't tell where the sound emanates
from exactly.
   Exits lead to the east along the hallway, and south back to the entrance.

exits.description: More of the hallway there... how exciting!
The entrance to the newbie zone... how dull

rooms.name: The Dirty Hallway
rooms.description:
You continue wandering down the hallway.  Nothing much different here,
but you are positive you here noises behind the door to the south, and
coming from the east.  The walls are a bit slimy and moldy here... yeech,
couldn't they hire someone to clean this place?  What will the newbies
think?  Oh well, you can continue along the hallway to the east or west.

exits.description: More of the hallway there... how exciting!
A small room lies to the south... you hear something moving about inside.
More of the hallway there... how exciting!

rooms.name: A Nexus
rooms.description:
Well... you've reached an intersection of two passages, to the north
and east, the passage brightens, while the darker hallway continues to
the south.

exits.description: A brighter hallway leads off that way.
A brighter hallway leads off that way.
More of the hallway there... how exciting!
More of the hallway there... how exciting!

rooms.name: A Narrow Passage
rooms.description:
The thin passage is plain and undecorated, but still clean.  It
ends abruptly to the south at a small oak door, behind which you here
movement...

exits.description: A large domed room.
A small cluttered room.

rooms.name: The Dark Pit
rooms.description:
Ick... a dark damp dirty pit.  Even worse, what is that dark damp
dirty thing looking at you from the corner?  Ewww... maybe you should
go back up where it is a bit safer, unless you think you can tackle
that thing in the corner.

exits.description: You see a ladder leading up

rooms.name: A Small Room
rooms.description:
Hmmm... this is an interesting little room.  Ack, and there is
an interesting little creature staring at you too.  He looks a bit
surprised at your intrusion.  You can leave via the doors north or
east, or you can stay and annoy him a bit more.  There also appears
to be some type of well down here also, but it has a rather secure
grate covering it.

exits.description: More of the hallway there... how exciting!
More of the hallway there... how exciting!
A ladder leads down into darkness.

rooms.name: More Of The Hallway
rooms.description:
Oh joy!  More of this annoying passage.  Perhaps there is something
more exciting through that door to the west?  Or you can keep searching
the hallways to the north or south.

exits.description: More of the hallway there... how exciting!
More of the hallway there... how exciting!

rooms.name: An Open Field By The Great Field
rooms.description:
Finally, you are in an open field... it is so nice to breathe fresh air
again!  You can return to that dank, smelly place to the east, or take the
exit to the west which appears to lead into a large field.

exits.description: The end of that darn hallway lies back to the east.

rooms.name: The End Of The Passage
rooms.description:
Ahhh... at last, the end of the hallway... you can exit into open
air to the west,or return to the east and make sure you didn't miss
anything.

exits.description: More of the hallway there... how exciting!
An open field near The Great Field of Midgaard can be seen.

rooms.name: A Brighter Hallway
rooms.description:
The hallway continues on in a east-west direction... and it seems to
be brightening up to the west.

exits.description: A corner in the passage lies to the east.
More of the hallway there... how exciting!

rooms.name: Another Corner
rooms.description:
Another corner of the passage, and just as untidy as the rest of
this place (maybe more so?).  There is a door to the east though...
wonder where that leads?  Oh, and the hallway continues west and
north.

exits.description: More of the hallway there... how exciting!
You peer into a cluttered little room to the east.
More of the hallway there... how exciting!

rooms.name: The Alchemist's Room
rooms.description:
Lots of bottles and flasks lie about this room, but it all looks like
worthless clutter.  It appears whatever alchemist has been working here
is really very adept at his art.  There are a lot of formulae and spells
written on the walls too... couldn't he buy some paper?  There is a door
to the north, and also a dark stairway in the corner leading down, with a
large sign next to it that you probably should read...

exits.description: A nice shiny hallway!
A corner in the passage lies to the west.
A shadowed stairway leading down.

extra_descriptions.description:
The sign next to the stairs says:

If you are below level 7 and alone, or below level 4 then bugger off!
Or else don't blame me if you die...

rooms.name: A Turn In The Passage
rooms.description:
This corner is much like all the others... except you see a strange
glow coming from the south.  Could be an exit... you hope.

exits.description: The passage continues east quite a ways.
You see an odd red glow from that direction.

rooms.name: A T-Intersection In The Passage
rooms.description:
This is an intersection of a long east-west passage with a corridor
leading south.  The air seems a bit clearer here though, as if you were
approaching an exit.

rooms.name: Another Corner
rooms.description:
The passage turns from north to west here.  The walls are still
covered with the same disgusting green fungus you have seen all
along, and you hear sounds of creatures moving all around you...

rooms.name: A Corner In The Hallway
rooms.description:
You can hear creatures moving all around you... and it is not
a comforting sound at all.  The furnishing is nothing to speak of
either, plain grey brick walls with green fungus (or something)
growing on them.

rooms.name: Another Turn
rooms.description:
Hmmm... the passage turns south here.  You beginning to realize you
can easily lose your bearings if you aren't careful, and you don't think
you would like spending too much time here...

rooms.name: A Large Room
rooms.description:
The passage opens into a large oval room.  There really isn't much of
interest here though.

rooms.name: A Long East-West Passage
rooms.description:
This is a long, narrow passage leading east and west.  The walls are
damp and covered with mildew and fungus.  There is a very unhealthy air
about this place and you're beginning to want out of here... soon.

rooms.name: A Crossing Of Corridors
rooms.description:
Here a narrow east-west passage crosses with a wider passage to the
north and south.  The air is dank, and has an odor of decay and debris.
Not a nice place at all really...

rooms.name: A Corner Room
rooms.description:
This room is hardly more than a crossing of passages.  You do sense a
slight breeze wafting down the passage to the north though, but it smells
altogether bad...

rooms.name: The Red Room
rooms.description:
It takes you a moment to realize that the red glow here is coming
from a round portal on the floor.  It looks almost as if someone had
painted a picture of a dirt running through a field on the floor of
this room.  Oddly enough, it is so realistic you can feel the wind in
the field coming out of the picture.

extra_descriptions.description:
It looks as if you could go down into it... but you can't be sure of where
you will end up, or if you can get back.

rooms.name: A Branching Passage
rooms.description:
The north-south passage branches to the east here.  There is a queer red
glow coming from that way as well, along with a faint breeze.

exits.description: A very odd red glow emanates from that direction.

rooms.name: A Passage
rooms.description:
Ick... this place is just disgusting.  You try and stay clear of the
walls, but the passage is so narrow you keep bumping them anyway.  You
are almost convinced that the fungus coating the walls is grabbing at
you too.

rooms.name: The Entrance
rooms.description:
It is dark, dank, disgusting and cold up here.  Plus you here the
sounds of creatures all around you... and somehow they don't sound
friendly.  It is probably wise to exercise some degree of caution
here... no telling what you may run into here.

rooms.name: Another Corner
rooms.description:
Well... what is there to say.  More fungus, more weird sounds, and a
slight breeze from the north.  Bet you want to sign a lease, don't ya...

rooms.name: An Intersection Of Passages
rooms.description:
Cold, smelly, and coated with green fungus... just like last week's
left-overs.  Furthermore you want nothing to do with either, you just
want out right now.

rooms.name: A Turn In The Passage
rooms.description:
This place is just plain nauseating... it certainly smells as if
something (or someone) died in here.  You hope you aren't next, but
from the sounds you hear all around you, it seems as if something has
other ideas about that.

rooms.name: A Branch To The South
rooms.description:
The east-west passage branches of to the south here.  All around you
is the odour of death.  Actually, the mold and fungus on the walls is
doing great, but otherwise... well... you don't want to think about what
else lives here.

rooms.name: Yet Another Corner
rooms.description:
The passage turns here and heads north.  You sense something up ahead
that way, but you aren't sure what.  You aren't sure if you want to know
what either at this point.

rooms.name: A Large Room
rooms.description:
You almost stumble as you enter this room... the sudden feeling of no
walls on either side of you makes you a bit nervous.  Suddenly you are
vulnerable on all sides.  You can't even tell how big a room this is,
because it extends to the east farther than you light will reach...

exits.description: The room extends into shadows...

rooms.name: A Large Room
rooms.description:
As you enter, you light glints of the wall to the east.  There appears
to be words scrawled on the wall, and a crude picture.  To the west the
room extends beyond the reach of your light, and the dark shadows make you
paranoid... anything could be hiding there.  You are painfully aware of
how exposed you are without walls around you.

exits.description: The room extends as far as (and farther than) you can see...

extra_descriptions.description: The writing appears to says 'beware the Minotaur...'

There is a crude picture of a man with the head of a bull with some writing
next to it.

rooms.name: The Statue's Room
rooms.description:
Here, the passage enters a small room.  Exits lead to the east and south,
and you notice a wonderful, large (and tastefully done) statue to the north.

exits.description: A long hallway, ending in a set of steps.
The hall extends to the south where it seems to darken somewhat.

extra_descriptions.description:
Upon closer inspection you see that the statue has a small plaque affixed
to it.  The face looks remarkably familiar also.

It says:

Maynard, Death Jester of the Harlequins

rooms.name: The Hallway
rooms.description:
As you continue wandering down the hallway, you notice banners,
pictures, and other fine decorations adorning the walls all along
this passage.  It seems very different from the dismal passage where
you entered.

exits.description: The hallway ends at a grand marble staircase.
The passage leads into a small room.

rooms.name: The North Stairs
rooms.description:
Here, the hall opens into a wide room, with a high domed roof.  Now that
that you have come clear of the enclosed passage, you can see that the stair
leads upward to an open air balcony overlooking the area.  To the south the
room continues, and another stair is visible matching the one in front of
you.

exits.description: You see another staircase and two passages leading west and south.
An entrance to a bright passage.
An open air balcony.

extra_descriptions.description: They are constructed of smooth, beautiful marble

rooms.name: The Balcony
rooms.description:
Here you can look out and observe the world around.  Constructed in a
semi-circle around the dome of the room, the balcony allows you to look
out in almost any direction.  Wandering to the north end, you can see that
the Great Fields north of Midgaard continue off towards the Dragonhelm
Mountains to the north.

exits.description: The south end of the balcony.
Down the stairs to a large, domed room.

extra_descriptions.description: They are constructed of smooth, beautiful marble

rooms.name: A Bright Hallway
rooms.description:
Wow!  What a change from the dismal passage to the south.  Whoever
keeps this room up must really like newbies.  The walls and floor are
clean, and tastefully decorated.  You also notice an interesting design
on the floor.

exits.description: A small room with a statue in it.
A intersection of passages.

extra_descriptions.description: It appears to be the Crest of the Harlequin Guild.

rooms.name: The Balcony
rooms.description:
Here you can look out and observe the world around.  Constructed in a
semi-circle around the dome of the room, the balcony allows you to look out
in almost any direction.  Wandering to the south end, you can see the great
city of Midgaard off to the south-west.

exits.description: The north end of the balcony.
Back down the south staircase.

extra_descriptions.description: They are constructed of smooth, beautiful marble.

rooms.name: A Bright Hallway
rooms.description:
Wow!  What a change from the dismal passage to the west.  Whoever keeps
this  room up must really like newbies.  The walls and floor are clean, and
tastefully decorated.  You also notice an interesting design on the floor.

exits.description: The passage opens into a domed room with a grand marble staircase.
A dark intersection of passages.

extra_descriptions.description: It appears to be the crest of the Harlequin Guild.

rooms.name: The South Stairs
rooms.description:
Here, the hall opens into a wide room, with a high domed roof.  Now that
that you have come clear of the enclosed passage, you can see that the stair
leads upward to an open air balcony overlooking the area.  to the north the
room continues, and another stair is visible matching the one in front of
you.

exits.description: Another stairway is to the north, as well as a passage to the west.
A narrow passage to the south, ending in a wood door.
Back down the bright hallway.
An open air balcony.

extra_descriptions.description: They are constructed of smooth, beautiful marble.
